ENG ITA RUS

  * __
  *   * __
  * __

ENG ITA RUS

  * Company
    * Profile
    * History
    * Sottoriva America
    * Sottoriva Museum
    * Bread Technology Center
    * Certifications
    * Encyclopedia of Italian Bread
  * Products
    * Full Catalogue
      * Automatic Feeder
        * AAC

Automatic star feeder for dividers.

AAPS

Automatic star feeder for dividers.

MP.A

Automatic star feeder for dividers.

      * Automatic units
        * BRIO - BRIO/S

The automatic unit Mod. BRIO is for medium and high-sized production of rolls
and ciabatta bread.

BRIO 2

The automatic unit Mod. BRIO 2 is for medium and high-sized production of
rolls and ciabatta bread.

DUETTO 2 - DUETTO 2/S

The automatic unit Mod. DUETTO is suitable for medium productions of bread
rolled or divided Ciabatt

WINNER - WINNER/S

Suitable for the production of finger rolls.

      * Deck ovens
        * MODUL

Electric modular deck oven.

      * Dividers
        *         * Bread dividers
          * ZERO 10

The industrial piston automatic divider Mod. ZERO 10 is a machine suitable to
divide the dough into

ZERO 5 - ZERO 6

The piston automatic divider Mod. ZERO 5 is a machine suitable to divide the
dough into equal parts

        * Divider rounders
          * ATHENA LARGE PLUS

Divider rounder at 4-5 or 6 rows for a maximum production of 15.000
pieces/hour.

ATHENA PLUS

Divider rounder at 4-5 or 6 rows for a maximum production of 15.000
pieces/hour.

DINAMICA

Divider rounder at 4-5-6 rows for a maximum production of 9.600 pieces/hour.

LYRA MAX

Divider rounder at two rows for a maximum production of 3.000 pieces/hour.

        * Stress free ciabatta dividers
          * MR8

Automatic divider no stress.

OPERA 240 - OPERA-ONE 240

Mod. OPERA 240 is a machine suitable for dividing dough to produce different
kinds of bakery product

TECNA

The automatic divider Mod. TECNA is a machine suitable for dividing dough to
produce different kinds

      * Final proofers
        * CLQ

Static proofing cells.

      * Intermediate proofers
        * CLI 1V

Intermediate proofers is designed to make round dough pieces.

      * Lifting-tilting machines
        * SC

Lifting-tilting machine suitable for automatic industrial plants.

      * Lines
        * Bread line
          * Basic Line 1

Line for the production of long-loaves, baguette and tin bread.

Basic Line 2

Line for the production of long-loaves, baguette and tin bread.

Bread Line 1500 H/P

Line for the production of long-loaves, baguette, tin bread with automatic
trays loading device.

Bread Line 3000 H/P

Line for the production of long-loaves, baguette, tin bread with automatic
trays loading device.

Bread Line 4500 H/P

Line for the production of long-loaves, baguette, tin bread with automatic
trays loading device.

        * Ciabatta Line
          * MR8

MR8, the latest advancement in Zero Stress Dough Technology for the best of
the Artisan Bread Produc

TECNA

Tecna, the stress free Ciabatta divider with loading device from 25 up to
2.000 g (0.88 to 70.55)

        * Line for round bread
          * FLEX LINE

Thanks to ATHENA PLUS LARGE with its "Stop Stress System" it permits to obtain
perfect moulded produ

HI LINE 1

HI-LINE is a new concept of automatic lines, designed and designed for MEDIUM/
LARGE bakeries that r

HI LINE 3

This line is the little sister of the FLEX line 1 which is highly appreciated
by our clients due to

HI LINE 5

HI-LINE 5 is a COMPACT version of complete with printing station to obtain a
large number of product

HI LINE 6

HI-LINE 6 is the top version of the HI-LINE range and it combines all the
features of all the other

HI LINE 7

HI-LINE 7 is the most complete line of the range with the addition of the seed
deposit station: it c

MINI C40

MINI C40 is able to produce Hamburger Buns, Finger Rolls, Hot Dogs, Dinner
Rolls with a max hourly c

Mini SF3

MINI SF3 is able to produce Hamburger Buns, Finger Rolls, Hot dogs, Dinner
rolls with a max hourly c

ROLL LINE

The classical modular ROLL LINE for the production of hamburger buns, dinner
roll, finger rolls, hot

SMALL LINE

Small line is able to produce Hamburger Buns, Finger Rolls, Hot dogs, Dinner
rolls with a max hourl

SUPER FLEX LINE

Superflex, the top of the flexibility.

      * Long - loaf moulders
        * F3

The moulder Mod. F3 is a machine suitable for rolled and long-loaf bread.

F4 - F4/R - F4/L

The Long-Loaf Moulder Mod. F4 is suitable for the production of rolled long
loaves.

      * Mixers
        * Double arm mixers
          * IBT2-3

Double arm mixer with fixed bowl IBT2 -3 particularly suitable for soft dough,
requiring a lot of ae

IBT4-5-6-7/M

Double arm mixer particularly fit for bakeries, bread stick factories,
confectionery and pastry shop

        * Fork mixers
          * ARCA

Fork mixer with motorised bowl suitable for hard and semi-hard dough.

        * Spiral mixers
          * EVO

Spiral mixer with removable bowl from 130 to 300 kg of dough.

PRISMA TWIST

Self tilting spiral mixer from 130 to 300 kg of dough.

SINTESI+

Spiral mixer with fixed bowl from 30 to 300 kg. of dough.

SPRINT V2

Spiral mixer with fixed bowl from 60 to 200 Kg of dough.

TWIST

Spiral mixer with fixed bowl from 30 to 300 kg. of dough.

      * Moulder for rolled breads
        * C40

Moulders for bread with 4 rollers.

C600

Moulders for bread with 2 rollers.

      * Rotating rack ovens
        * QUASAR

Rotating rack oven.

QUASAR COMPACT TOP

Rotating rack oven.

      * Rounders
        * ASR

This machine is designed for rounding soft and/or non-standard dough.

ASR 10

This industrial machine is designed for rounding soft and/or non-standard
dough.

      * Water chiller
        * SC

The automatic chiller reduce the water temperature.

      * Water dosing mixing units
        * MDA

The doser/mixer Mod. MDA is a water dosing/mixing device.

MDM

The doser/mixer Mod. MDA is a water dosing/mixing device.

SDA

The Mod. SDM is a water dosing device.

SDM

The Mod. SDM is a water dosing device.
